Author: xiaoyingdou
Text: was gonna reply to this earlier but I never got round to it, we went today and the size she said was actually two sizes too big for me. :)

Author: anxfloat
Text: I’m sorry that happened to you. Any mention of my body makes me tense up so I can just imagine how upsetting it would be to have someone bring up my clothing size. And you aren’t sensitive, nor is this your fault. We all have dumb disordered brains here. It is a good thing that you didn’t back out of going shopping though and I hope you have loads of fun
